headlines.description: Parma handed an ineffective Napoli a shock 2-1 defeat on Wednesday in a Serie A match in which all the goals came from penalties.
headlines.shortLinkText: Parma stun Napoli in game of three penalties

headlines.description: Inter Milan twice hit the post and were also foiled by goalkeeper Pietro Terracciano as they were held to a 0-0 draw by Fiorentina on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Juve on brink after Inter held by Fiorentina

venue.fullName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

venue.displayName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: Genoa moved closer to safety when they beat neighbours Sampdoria 3-1 in the Lighthouse Derby on Wednesday while Brescia were relegated.
headlines.shortLinkText: Genoa moves closer to safety, Brescia relegated

headlines.description: Nicolo Zaniolo ran 60 metres of the field, leaving a trail of opponents in his wake, as he scored an extraordinary solo goal to cap AS Roma's 6-1 wi
headlines.shortLinkText: Zaniolo's extraordinary solo goal caps Roma rout
